title: Graded T206's For Sale - PSA 2 and above
author: Mantle77CA

posts.post_title: Graded T206's For Sale - PSA 2 and above

posts.post_content:
Good afternoon,
Congrats on the T206 set, and the post of some very good & fair priced cards here. I have seen the quality of the T206 cards here sorta diminish & the prices usually similar to Ebay. So thanks for a fresh look. Also many are going SGC which surprises me of the veterans that I have encountered here.

But back to the cards... I am interested in other cards if you have or compile them in the 5-6 PSA grades(a few 4's, less than 10)... but my back focus is the Sweet Caporal's if that comes your way.
Again, congrats.
-Tracy Snider
[url]tracy@sniderinsurance.com[/url]

[quote name="6sniders" post=2463659]Good afternoon,
Congrats on the T206 set, and the post of some very good & fair priced cards here. I have seen the quality of the T206 cards here sorta diminish & the prices usually similar to Ebay. So thanks for a fresh look. Also many are going SGC which surprises me of the veterans that I have encountered here.

But back to the cards... I am interested in other cards if you have or compile them in the 5-6 PSA grades(a few 4's, less than 10)... but my back focus is the Sweet Caporal's if that comes your way.
Again, congrats.
-Tracy Snider
[url]tracy@sniderinsurance.com[/url][/QUOTE]

Thanks!  I am building a Piedmont back set so I don’t generally collect Sweet Caporals.  Occasionally though some do come my way so if I have any that fit your specs I’ll be sure to reach out.
How many of these have you sold on Net 54?

[quote name="Bobbycee" post=2463670]How many of these have you sold on Net 54?[/QUOTE]

A few.  Most were sold on the FB groups so far.

I'm up for Carrington and Moran

Sent from my SM-S921U using Tapatalk

[quote name="Mike Eisenbath" post=2464658]I'm up for Carrington and Moran

Sent from my SM-S921U using Tapatalk[/QUOTE]

Great I Pmed you. Thanks-
Cleaned up the original post, alphabetized, added a couple of new cards and updated all photos.
Added a PSA 4 Ed Killian to the party :)
Updated for sold items and added a PSA 4.5 Beals Becker to the group.
Added 4 new cards and updated for sold cards.
Pre EBay auction sale - 10% off all listed prices here.  Thanks!
I'll take Moriarty, PSA 5 at the 10% discount if still available.

[quote name="Bobbycee" post=2473092]I'll take Moriarty, PSA 5 at the 10% discount if still available.[/QUOTE]

He’s yours, I’ll PM you. Thanks
Just to prevent any confusion, all listed prices reflect the 10% discount now.  Also updated for sold items.  Thanks-
I'm interested in some of these. I Pmed you. Thanks!
Updated for Sold cards and added a Howie Camnitz PSA 4.  Couldn’t get the pic to upload but I can send it to you if interested.
